TrademarkInformation.MarkDescription: The mark consists of the standard characters "AVRT" representing Advanced Voice Reasoning Technology.

InternationalClass.Description: Software as a service (SaaS) services featuring software for AI safety validation; platform as a service (PaaS) featuring computer software platforms for ethical AI middleware; providing temporary use of online non-downloadable software for monitoring and validating AI-generated content; computer software consulting services in the field of AI ethics and safety; technical support services, namely, troubleshooting of computer software problems related to AI content validation; research and development services in the field of artificial intelligence ethics and safety protocols.

FilingBasisInformation.IntentToUseStatement: Applicant has a bona fide intention to use the mark in commerce on or in connection with the identified goods/services.

Declarations.Statement: The signatory believes the applicant to be the owner of the trademark sought to be registered. The mark is in use in commerce, or the applicant has a bona fide intention to use the mark in commerce. To the best of the signatory's knowledge and belief, no other person has the right to use the mark in commerce, either in the identical form or in such near resemblance as to be likely to cause confusion, mistake, or deception.

TrademarkInformation.MarkDescription: The mark consists of the standard characters "SPIEL" representing the acronym for Safety, Personalization, Integrity, Ethics, and Logic framework.
TrademarkInformation.MeaningStatement: SPIEL is an acronym for Safety, Personalization, Integrity, Ethics, and Logic, representing a comprehensive ethical reasoning framework for AI systems.

FilingBasisInformation.IntentToUseStatement: Applicant has a bona fide intention to use the mark in commerce on or in connection with the identified goods/services.

TrademarkInformation.MarkDescription: The mark consists of the standard characters "THT" representing the protocol for Truth, Honesty, and Transparency in AI communications.
TrademarkInformation.MeaningStatement: THT is an acronym for Truth, Honesty, and Transparency, representing a validation protocol ensuring factual accuracy, transparent intent, and explainable reasoning in AI systems.

InternationalClass.Description: Software as a service (SaaS) featuring AI truth verification protocols; platform services for implementing transparency and honesty validation in AI systems; consulting services related to AI fact-checking and verification technologies.

FilingBasisInformation.IntentToUseStatement: Applicant has a bona fide intention to use the mark in commerce on or in connection with the identified goods/services.

TrademarkInformation.MarkDescription: The mark consists of the standard characters "EaaS" representing Ethics as a Service.
TrademarkInformation.MeaningStatement: EaaS is an acronym for "Ethics as a Service," representing cloud-based ethical validation and compliance services for AI systems.

InternationalClass.Description: Downloadable cloud-based software for AI ethics validation; software for providing ethics-as-a-service functionality; API software for integrating ethical validation into AI applications.

FilingBasisInformation.IntentToUseStatement: Applicant has a bona fide intention to use the mark in commerce on or in connection with the identified goods/services.

TrademarkInformation.MarkDescription: The mark consists of the standard characters "AWOGO" representing Always Working On Getting Organized.
TrademarkInformation.MeaningStatement: AWOGO is an acronym for "Always Working On Getting Organized," representing a productivity and organization methodology integrated with AI-assisted workflow management, particularly designed for neurodivergent users.

InternationalClass.Description: Computer software for personal productivity and organization; downloadable mobile applications for task management and workflow organization; AI-assisted productivity software; software for neurodivergent-friendly task management; downloadable software for voice-based productivity tracking and organization.

Educational services, namely, providing training and workshops in the field of personal productivity and organization for neurodivergent individuals; coaching services in the field of task management and productivity optimization.

FilingBasisInformation.IntentToUseStatement: Applicant has a bona fide intention to use the mark in commerce on or in connection with the identified goods/services.
